content:
@Marten Smits
what's the reason for removing the identifier from the Observation resource?
That removes the client's ability to do conditional updates by (client's) identifier.
Are the Clients expected to persist the server assigned ids locally in order to be able to update Observations?
@Simone Heckmann Thanks for mentioning, my bad! It should have been there. I'm deploying a new version right now.
